message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $150 for it. Would you consider accepting this price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob. However, I'm looking for a bit more than that. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $175?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Given my budget constraints, I am still unable to meet you at $175. I would like to propose $160 as a compromise. Would you consider this offer?
